channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Agent

item.title: CVE-2023-48684|2024-04-29T15:48:03.752Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20cloud%20agent
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure and manipulation due to missing authorization. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Cloud Agent (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 37758.
